item.title: 2025 Recap: The Year Software Development Changed Shape
item.description: 2025 was the year software teams stopped optimizing models and started optimizing systems. By December, a few truths were impossible to ignore. 1. Developer Productivity Became the Real Competitive Advantage By mid-year, every major AI lab had cleared the “good enough reasoning” bar. With model quality converging, the differentiator was no longer raw intelligence. It... Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/2025-recap-the-year-software-development-changed-shape/
